segments.text: Hi Isabel ! You wanted to see me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes Anthony , come on in . Have a seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is everything okay ? You seem a bit preoccupied .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Anthony , this is not going to be an easy conversation.The company has made some decisions which will have a direct impact on your employment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t want to beat around the bush so I ’ m just gonna come out with it . We are going to have to let you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Why ? I mean ... just like that ? I ’ m fired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry but , to be honest , you are a terrible employee !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anthony , you were caught making international calls from the office phone , you called in sick in eight times this month and you smell like alcohol !
segments.speaker: S2
